Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!

A friend of mine told me about this game and recommended it. I took a look at the website and thought \'What the hell, it looks like it\'s made for kids\'. I downloaded it anyway and took it for a spin. What an awesome game! Whoever knew orbital mechanics could be so much fun? At first I couldn\'t work out how you traveled from A to B, although building rockets was fun nonetheless, but after three days and a little bit of reading on Wikipedia about orbital mechanics I can now land on Mun and Minmus and return. The last Minmus trip used Mun\'s gravity for a slingshot. Now in the process on planning a Mun and Minmis landing and return on the one journey. One thing that strikes me is how graceful orbital mechanics is.

I hope in the future we get docking and construction in space. I\'d love to be able to push fuel and parts into orbit and construct a station or pickup fuel for a mission.

Welcome aboard, i am sure you can find not so childish equations here that will blow your mind, the community just likes to have some fun, can you blame them?

Anyways, good to have another player with us!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
